instructions:
Spray 2 1/2-quart casserole or 13x9-inch (3 quart) baking dish with cooking spray. Arrange bread cubes in even layer in dish.
Beat eggs, half-and-half, vanilla and salt. Pour over bread. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour, or up to 24 hours, or until bread is completely saturated.
Heat oven to 400 degrees F. Uncover dish and bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve with syrup, if you like.
ingredients: 1 (26.5 ounce) loaf Archer Farms® traditional pannetone, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 teaspoon Archer Farms pure vanilla extract
title: Panettone French Toast Bake
